description:
version:
kilo

steps:
with nova-notwork vlan manager,  when booting vm,   vmware driver find corrent vSwitch according to vlan_interface, and create portgroup on the switch of  ESXi A.
But when creating vm,  cluster DRS will allocate vm to ESXi B.  ESXi B have not correct portgroup.

Result：
VM can not communicate with other vm

suggestion:
VMware driver should sync networking configuration between ESXi.
title: [vmware] with nova-network, vmware driver can not connect vm to portgroup
